https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nCoY8UK2x4DWpICipL40Hg4cDmO.jpg Finally released from prison, Elwood Blues is once again enlisted by Sister Mary Stigmata in her latest crusade to raise funds for a children's hospital. Hitting the road to re-unite the band and win the big prize at the New Orleans Battle of the Bands, Elwood is pursued cross-country by the cops. Blues Brothers 2000
